mapper.select: select workorder.wo_num, DATE_FORMAT(workorder.wo_date,'%Y-%m-%d') as wo_date, workorder.wo_qty, contract.business_name, contract.item_name, DATE_FORMAT(contract.out_date,'%Y-%m-%d') as out_date, COALESCE(unsto_progress,'미출고') as unsto_progress from unstore right outer join workorder on unstore.wo_num=workorder.wo_num right outer join contract on workorder.business_num = contract.business_num where workorder.wo_available=1
